description.narrative: Support to national and local actors in the Philippines in their ongoing efforts to prevent violent extremism through early-warning-and-response system and platforms for inter-faith dialogue

sector.narrative: Build resilience to shocks and crisis

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: 1. Bitiala Center for inter-faith dialogue, meditation and reflection constructed and launched 2. Number of dialogue facilitators trained and engaged to facilitate inter-faith dialogue, meditation and reflection in the Bitiala Center 3. Number of inter-faith dialogue sessions conducted in the Bitiala Center 4. Number of participants engaged in inter-faith dialogue sessions in the Bitiala Center 5. Number of Madaris Volunteer Programme volunteers trained and deployed 6. Number of additional madaris served by the Madaris Volunteer Programme 7. Number of students reached through expansion of the Madaris Volunteer Programme 8. Number of trainings conducted on mediation and conflict resolution for selected youth in identified areas in Mindanao and the Visayas 9. Number of youth participants from identified areas in Mindanao and the Visayas trained on mediation and conflict resolution 10. Number of trained individuals deployed to assist with community conflict resolution and mediation efforts in areas affected vulnerable to conflict and violence 11. Virtual Network against violent extremism via social media established and operationalized 12. Research conducted on the role of madaris and religious schools in the promotion or prevention of violent extremism, including conduct of synthesis and sharing workshop 13. Number of government institutions from peace and security sector engaged on the development of a National Action Plan for the Prevention of Violent Extremism 14. Number of joint exercises conducted among government institutions for shared analysis, planning and development of National Action Plan for the Prevention of Violent Extremism 15. National Action Plan for the Prevention of Violent Extremism developed and completed 16. Number of design and planning workshops conducted to create platforms for early warning and response systems for conflict and violence 17.
